contents.text: Welcome to TalentBurst in San Francisco, your partner in staffing, managed services, and vendor management solutions—call today!
Please hold while we connect you to our permanent placement specialists.

navigationGoals: I need to hire a permanent software engineer and want to speak with your placement specialist.
I’m looking to secure a full-time, permanent position leveraging my leadership experience in logistics.
Initiate a full-time hire requisition for a senior Java engineer with compensation benchmarking details
I need help speaking with someone about permanent job placement.
I’m exploring full-time placement as a junior physicist in an applied research facility.

contents.text: For contract and temporary staffing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our contract and temporary staffing team.

navigationGoals: I have an urgent need for a three-month IT contractor and need to connect with your temporary staffing team.
I need assistance finding short-term or contract roles in operations while I transition to civilian work.
Onboard a 6-month contract cybersecurity analyst and review the SOW and onboarding workflow
I need information on temporary or contract staffing opportunities.
I need a six-month contract role helping with experimental data analysis in a physics lab.

contents.text: For our MSP and VMS solutions, press 2.
For Managed Services Provider inquiries, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our managed services provider team.

navigationGoals: I’d like details on your managed services offerings and SLAs for our network infrastructure.
I’d like to learn about TalentBurst’s managed services solutions to support my veteran-owned IT consulting firm.
Evaluate your MSP solution’s SLA uptime guarantees and its integration with my AWS environment
I want to learn more about their managed services provider solutions.
I’d like to learn about managed IT services for our university’s physics computing cluster.

contents.text: For Vendor Management System support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our vendor management support team.

navigationGoals: I need assistance accessing the vendor management portal to onboard a new supplier.
I’m having trouble accessing the vendor management system to manage my subcontractor bids.
Troubleshoot VMS API integration with my procurement platform to automate purchase order workflows
I need assistance with support for the vendor management system.
I’m having trouble accessing the vendor portal to update my contract and credentials.
